message.value: Cannot set the value of game rule %s, the value is missing
The value of game rule %s is now set to : %s
The value of game rule %s is now set to : %s (in game)
To enable or disable the pvp
To enable or disable the display of team mates location of a player
You cannot enchant this item, the max level of enchant %s is %s (getting level %s)
To set the max level of the protection enchantment on diamonds armor pieces
To set whether or not a respawning player should be teleported to a teammate
